name: Cipher BSK Pass Manager
author: Sazzad Saju
description: A lightweight password manager extension implementing a developed cipher model from the research paper 'A Hybrid Cryptographic Scheme of Modified Vigen√®re Cipher using a Randomized Approach for Enhancing Data Security' by Sazzad Saju. Designed for robust everyday data protection, this extension enables securely store sensitive data on server and retrieve back efficiently. Learn more at: https://bit.ly/cipher-bsk.
